price: İbrahimi də (xatırla)! Bir zaman o öz qövmünə demişdi: “Allaha ibadət edin və Ondan qorxun! Bu sizin üçün daha xeyirlidir, kaş ki bilsəydiniz”.
arabic: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۖ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ib'rāhīma idh qāla liqawmihi uʿ'budū al-laha wa-ittaqūhu dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
